summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Super Pin feature improvements. All 3 features implemented correctly: 1) Multiple check-in methods selection with checkboxes (Manual, QR Code, Geolocation), 2) 'Volver a PinpanClub' button working correctly, 3) Player source tabs in new match modal (PinpanClub, Usuarios App, Monday.com). Backend APIs 100% passing (12/12 tests). Frontend UI fully functional.
passed_tests: Backend: Admin login with credentials (admin@libreria.com / admin) - 200 OK
Backend: GET /api/auth-v2/users returns list of registered users - 200 OK
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/monday/players endpoint exists and responds - 200 OK
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/superpin/leagues returns leagues list - 200 OK
Backend: Leagues have checkin_config with method/methods field
Backend: Create league with multiple check-in methods (manual, qr_code, geolocation) - 200 OK
Backend: GET league detail and ranking endpoints working
Frontend: 'Volver a PinpanClub' button visible on /pinpanclub/superpin/admin
Frontend: Button navigates correctly to /pinpanclub dashboard
